source.interface:
<implements name="MatrixDecomposition" />
* Schur: [A] = [Q][U][Q]-1 * [A] = [Q][U][Q]-1 where: * *
[A] is a square complex entry matrix. *
[Q] is a unitary matrix (so that [Q]-1 equals * [Q]H). *
[U] is an upper triangular matrix, which is called a Schur form * of [A]. Since [U] is similar to [A], it has the same multiset of * eigenvalues, and since it is triangular, those eigenvalues are the * diagonal entries of [U]. * apete
<method name="getDiagonal" type="Array1D" startLine="45" endLine="45" /> <method name="getQ" type="MatrixStore" startLine="47" endLine="47" /> <method name="getU" type="MatrixStore" startLine="49" endLine="49" />
